meanings.definition: A type of swift-running African and Asian mammal with long, slender legs and horns.
meanings.sent1: The antelopes gracefully leaped across the savannah.
meanings.sent2: We saw a herd of antelopes grazing peacefully in the field.
meanings.sent3: The antelopes decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of an antelope racing through the grasslands.
meanings.sent5: The image of the antelopes running under the golden sun was breathtaking.
